lines.text: Oh, and then there's that thing.
I installed that a while ago, as sort of a photographic memory thing...
...but really it only works for <c=#FF00FF>the last few things people said.</c>
I guess it's kinda useful if I zone out and miss something important?
If I talk to the log, it'll repeat <c=#FF00FF>the last 20 lines of dialogue.</c>
